# filedocumentr

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of filedocumentr is to provide documentation of files in data directories in a standardized format.

## Installation

You can install the released version of filedocumentr from github with:

``` r
# library(devtools)
install_github("MartinSchobben/filedocumentr")
```

## Example

This is a basic example which shows you how to include a README file in your data directory:

```r
# library(filedocumentr)
# initiate README
use_filedocumentr()
```
